title: My in game chat is disabled? WTF
body: I can't see my team's chat nor can I type. On another account it works but not this one. I press Z and no chat pops up. I can't see my teammate's chat nor can I type. I've even tried resetting settings to default using the button AND manually. WTF!?!

replies.body: Were you able to resolve this? If not, I can assist you in resetting your files that are saved server-side.
Did you try setting it back to default?
